definitions.definition: Disbelief or uncertainty (about something); a particular instance of such disbelief or uncertainty.
definitions.example: I have doubts about how to convert this code to JavaScript.

definitions.definition: A point of uncertainty; a query.
To be undecided about; to lack confidence in; to disbelieve, to question.
definitions.example: He doubted that was really what you meant.

definitions.definition: To anticipate with dread or fear; to apprehend.
To fill with fear; to affright.
